chapter.verse: GOD is King, robed and ruling, GOD is robed and surging with strength. And yes, the world is firm, immovable,
Sea storms are up, GOD, Sea storms wild and roaring, Sea storms with thunderous breakers.
Stronger than wild sea storms, Mightier than sea-storm breakers, Mighty GOD rules from High Heaven.
What you say goes--it always has. "Beauty" and "Holy" mark your palace rule, GOD, to the very end of time.
